subject: Dear Friend
body:
Dear Friend
My name is Mrs. Jessica Felicia Jeffrey from United States, a widow suffering
from  Breast Cancer and Stroke,which denied me a child,i may not last
till the next two months according to my doctor report.I'm married to
late Pastor Jeffrey Wilson, and we were married for many years without
any  child before his death
I'm a 68 years old woman. I have some funds i inherited from my late
husband the sum of
(Ten Million dollars) which i needed a very honest
and God fearing person who will claim the funds from the Security
company where the fund was deposited and use the funds for work of God
Affairs like; donation in the house of God,propagating the good news
of God and to endeavor God worshiping place
and help less-privileged.
I found your profile and I decided to contact you for the donation
work of God.Please if you would be able to use the funds for the work
of God as i stated ,contact me back so i will lead you to my Lawyer
who will change all the Document in your Name as my Next of Kin this
will enable the security company to release the fund to you.I will
stop here until i hear from you.
May God bless you In Jesus name Amen!!!
Mrs. Jessica Felicia Jeffrey

subject: Re:   Dear Friend
body:
Dear Mrs. Jessica Felicia Jeffrey,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I'm sorry to hear about your health condition, and I hope you are receiving the necessary care and support during this difficult time.

I appreciate your trust in me and considering me for such an important task. However, before we proceed further, I have a few questions that I would like to ask:

1. Can you provide more details about the security company where the funds are currently deposited? How can we ensure that the funds will be released safely?

2. What specific work of God do you have in mind for these funds? Are there any particular projects or organizations that you would like to support?

3. Could you please introduce me to your lawyer so that I can discuss the legal aspects of this matter with them?

Once I have a better understanding of the situation, I will be able to make a more informed decision regarding my involvement. Thank you again for considering me for this opportunity.

May God bless you as well.

Best wishes,
Mary
